Method Detail

resumeExecution

public boolean resumeExecution(int id,
                               java.lang.String cName,
                               java.lang.String cType)
Resume execution of a stopped or discontinous process Will look through the database for current parents (Internal Nodes)

Parameters:
id - The id of the bpel process to resume
cName - The name of the node to resume at
cType - The type of the node to resume at
Returns:
true, this function is overwritten later and needs the return then
